Cookie Consent Manager
When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.
Required Cookies
These cookies are required to use this website and can't be turned off.
Show More Details
Required Cookies
Provider
Description
Enabled
SAP as service provider
We use the following session cookies, which are all required to enable the website to function:
"route" is used for session stickiness
"careerSiteCompanyId" is used to send the request to the correct data center
"JSESSIONID" is placed on the visitor's device during the session so the server can identify the visitor
"Load balancer cookie" (actual cookie name may vary)  prevents a visitor from bouncing from one instance to another
Advertising Cookies
These cookies serve ads that are relevant to your interests. You may freely choose to accept or decline these cookies at any time. Note that certain functionality that these third parties make available may be impacted if you do not accept these cookies.
Show More Details
Advertising Cookies
Provider
Description
Enabled
Google Analytics
Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic.
Cookie Information
Privacy Policy
Terms and Conditions
Confirm My Choices
Accept All Cookies

Central Park - Amenities and Activities
Central Park - Amenities and Activities
A BEAUTIFUL 55+ COMMUNITY IN FLORIDA
Central Park is a 55+ community with wide, tree-lined streets and fantastic amenities designed to enhance your retirement lifestyle. Dive into our heated outdoor pool, stay active in the fitness center, and join exciting events, from bingo and movie nights to dinner socials. Spend time with friends playing shuffleboard, petanque, and bocce ball, or start some friendly competition at the horseshoe pits. Make every day as exciting as you'd like at Central Park.
Clubhouse
Meet neighbors for fun times in our spacious clubhouse with card tables and billiards. Feeling lucky? Try your hand at our community bingo nights.
Outdoor Pool
Dive in and relax in our heated outdoor pool on sunny Florida days. Sit back and laze poolside on a lounge chair and soak up the sunshine.
Social Events & Activities
Get social. Enjoy a jam-packed calendar filled with community events like crafts, theater nights, cards, and pancake suppers.
Dog Park
Take the pups to our dedicated dog park for play time and fresh air. You will love living in our pet-friendly community.
Fitness Center
Stay active in our fitness room, featuring state-of-the-art training and cardio equipment for an energizing workout.
All Amenities
Experience an engaged retirement lifestyle with a range of amenities and recreational activities at our Haines City community.
Free Wi-Fi
Religious Services

Central Park
Inspired 55+ Florida Living in Haines City
Experience the best in 55+ living at Central Park in Haines City, Florida. Surrounded by the natural beauty of Central Florida, our retirement community offers modern manufactured homes on wide, tree-lined streets and a separate section with RV sites for vacationers and residents. Our neighborhood features amazing amenities and recreational activities, from our fishing lake to our beautiful clubhouse. Make every day as exciting as you want at Central Park.
Relax by our heated swimming pool, or spend time with friends and family playing a game of shuffleboard, petanque, or bocce ball. Get social with a packed calendar of community events filled with crafts, theater nights, cards, and pancake suppers. Feeling lucky? Try your hand at bingo or compete at the horseshoe pits. Make make your dreams of homeownership a reality at Central Park.
Read More
View Homes

Current Move-In Incentives
Become a valued new resident in our community and save! We invite you to take advantage of competitive rates and available special offers, as detailed below. Conditions/restrictions apply.
View All Specials
Click on View All Specials
Discover
Beyond our great community amenities and friendly staff, Central Park is just a short drive from famous Florida attractions in the Orlando and Tampa areas. Enjoy easy access from our Haines City community to golf courses, major shopping centers, and Orlando's world-famous theme parks, including Walt Disney World and SeaWorld Orlando, as well as Legoland Florida in Winter Haven.

Central Park
Contact Us
FAQ Contact Us
Is Haines City, Florida, a good place to live?
Is Haines City, Florida, a good place to live?
Haines City, Florida, offers a relaxed, small-town atmosphere with access to Florida's natural beauty and year-round warm weather. The city offers affordable living, a friendly community, and proximity to Orlando's top attractions. The city features geat shopping and dining, parks, recreational facilities, and cultural events, making it a desirable place for families and retirees.
How much is a new manufactured home in Haines City, Florida?
How much is a new manufactured home in Haines City, Florida?
The cost of our quality-built manufactured homes varies. We offer many
affordable homes
with access to complimentary community amenities for even more value. Please contact our team for pricing and more information.
What recreational activities are offered at Central Park?
What recreational activities are offered at Central Park?
Central Park features numerous
amenities
and recreational activities, including a swimming pool, fitness center, shuffleboard, pickleball courts, horseshoes, and a fishing lake. Residents can also join planned activities and events in the clubhouse, including bingo and game nights.
What are the best attractions in Haines City, Florida?
What are the best attractions in Haines City, Florida?
Central Park is close to the city’s best attractions, including Visit Central Florida Welcome Center, Bok Tower Gardens, Small World Tour & Cruises, Inc., Lake Eva Community Park, and Magic Kingdom Park.
Phone:
(844) 637-7820
https://www.suncommunities.com/florida/central-park
Central Park
Contact Us
FAQ Contact Us
Don’t Take it From Us. Hear From our Residents.
"Been living here for about two years now and I really like the place and the people! I just wanted to say, for someone who washes clothes every other day literally, lol, the laundry room is always kept immaculate!"
Don’t Take it From Us. Hear From our Residents.
"I live there. Very nice park. Very clean. People are real nice. They keep you busy for your own health. Plenty of activities. I will give this park 4 and a half stars. Only because everyone knows that no one is perfect. I highly recommend this park to anyone."
Don’t Take it From Us. Hear From our Residents.
"Great place love it for vacation or to live it's awesome they have it all: pool, clubhouse, everything that you would like to do it's there all in one place. Security is awesome, too. You feel safe and could sleep well knowing that your kids and family are in a secure place."
